entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 1 Episode 1 "A Child Like Me"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 1 Episode 1 "A Child Like Me"
media:group.media:description:
How do you show someone that you love them? Do you give them lots of hugs? Are you kind to them? Do you give them presents? Do you do what they ask? Do you help them?
"Then he went down to Nazareth . . . and was obedient." LUKE 2:51, NIV.
We are like Jesus when we obey and help.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 1 Episode 2 "Daddy's Helper"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 1 Episode 2 "Daddy's Helper"
media:group.media:description:
What are some new things you are learning to do? Are you learning new ways to help around the house? When you do your best work, you are growing up to be like Jesus.
"Even a child is known by his actions." PROVERBS 20:11, NIV.
We serve God when we do our best work.
more at www.gracelink.net or www.youtube.com/sabbathschool

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 1 Episode 3 "Lost And Found"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 1 Episode 3 "Lost And Found"
media:group.media:description:
What do you like to do most in Sabbath School and church? Sing songs? Give an offering? Listen to stories about Jesus?
"And Jesus grew in wisdom and stature." LUKE 2:52, NIV.
We learn so that we can help others.
close captioning provided by Faith Toh at Studio Elpizo (Singapore) and only available on youtube.com
The video can be downloaded from www.vimeo.com/channels/gracelink without the close captioning feature.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 1 Episode 4 "Friend To All"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 1 Episode 4 "Friend To All"
media:group.media:description:
Do you like animals? What do you like to do with animals? Pet them? Feed them? Jesus liked animals too. He probably cared for them like this.
"Be kind . . . to one another." EPHESIANS 4:32, NIV.
We serve God when we are kind.
Download at www.vimeo.com/channels/gracelink see more at ww.gracelink.net

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 1 Episode 5 "Let Them Come"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 1 Episode 5 "Let Them Come"
media:group.media:description:
Who is your favorite grown-up besides your parents? Is it your grandma or grandpa? Your Sabbath School teacher? When Jesus was on earth, He was many children's favorite grown-up. Let's see why.
"Let the little children come to me. LUKE 18:16, NIV.
Jesus loves me! He wants me in His family!
Download at www.vimeo.com/channels/gracelink see more at ww.gracelink.net

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 1 Episode 6 "Too Short To See"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 1 Episode 6 "Too Short To See"
media:group.media:description:
Do you know someone that other people don't like? Do you think Jesus likes that person? What would you do if you knew no one liked you?
"[Jesus] came to seek and to save what was lost." LUKE 19:10, NIV.
Jesus wants everyone to be in His family.
Download at www.vimeo.com/channels/gracelink more at gracelink.net/​podcast

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 1 Episode 7 "Who Is Your Neighbor?"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 1 Episode 7 "Who Is Your Neighbor?"
media:group.media:description:
Who is your neighbor? Is it the person who lives next door to you? Jesus said that to be a good neighbor means more than that!
"Love your neighbor as yourself." LUKE 10:27, NIV.
God wants us to show love to everyone.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 1 Episode 8 "Lazarus, Come Out!"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 1 Episode 8 "Lazarus, Come Out!"
media:group.media:description:
Has someone you love been sick—so sick that they died? The Bible tells about two sisters who didn't want their brother to die. They wanted Jesus to help him.
"Jesus loved Martha and her sister and Lazarus." JOHN 11:5, NIV.
Jesus does what is best for us.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 1 Episode 9 "A Praise Parade"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 1 Episode 9 "A Praise Parade"
media:group.media:description:
For what do you like to thank Jesus? How do you show Him you love Him? Long ago, people praised Him with a parade, palm branches, and loud voices.
"Blessed is the king who comes in the name of the Lord!" LUKE 19:38, NIV.
We worship Jesus when we praise Him.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 1 Episode 10 "A Special Supper"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 1 Episode 10 "A Special Supper"
media:group.media:description:
Who reminds you to wash your hands before you eat? A long time ago Jesus helped His friends wash before supper, but it wasn't their hands He was concerned about!
"He now showed them . . . his love." JOHN 13:1, NIV
We praise Jesus for showing us His love.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 1 Episode 11 "Jesus Loves Me"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 1 Episode 11 "Jesus Loves Me"
media:group.media:description: Have you ever had to do something really hard? Jesus did something really hard for you. "You are worthy . . . God, to receive glory and honor and power." REVELATION 4:11, NIV. We praise Jesus for doing hard things for us.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 1 Episode 12 "He's Alive"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 1 Episode 12 "He's Alive"
media:group.media:description:
Have you ever known someone who died? Jesus died. But God raised Him back to life.
"We believe that Jesus died and rose again." 1 THESSALONIANS 4:14, NIV.
We praise Jesus because He died and rose again.

entry.title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 1 Episode 13 "Coming in the Clouds"

media:group.media:title: Kindergarten Year B Quarter 1 Episode 13 "Coming in the Clouds"
media:group.media:description:
Can you think of the best day you've ever had? The best place you've ever been? The best gift you've ever received? Heaven will be all of those things and better! Here's how Emma learned about heaven.
"We are looking forward to a new heaven." 2 PETER 3:13, NIV.
We praise Jesus for His gift of heaven.
